## IonDIDProvider.removeService() method

Removes a service from a DID Document

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeService({ identifier, id, options }: {
        identifier: IIdentifier;
        id: string;
        options?: IUpdateOpts;
    }, context: IContext): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter                   | Type                                                                                           | Description |
| --------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| { identifier, id, options } | { identifier: [IIdentifier](./core-types.iidentifier.md); id: string; options?: IUpdateOpts; } |             |
| context                     | IContext                                                                                       |             |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any&gt;

identifier provider specific response. Can be txHash, etc,
